Crit Effect

Type
Funny Bone You drop one item you are holding (determined randomly by the GM).

Melee
Not my Pony! You hit the nearest animal companion, mount, or familiar.

Ranged
Bad Headbutt You are stunned 1.

Unarmed
Caster's Block You can't cast this spell again at any level until you rest and make your daily preparations.

name: Critical Fumble Deck #33
